TEXT.TITLE: EAGLE TELEPHONICS <EGLA> SELLS TELEPHONES
TEXT.BODY: Eagle Telephonics Inc said it signed a two-year agreement under which Pacific Telesis Group's <PAC> Pacific Bell unit will buy its Eagle line of electronic key telephone systems for internal use. Terms of the contract were not disclosed. Reuter
